notes:
[Drana's Emissary] hands-down the best enabler for the BW Lifegain deck. Unfortunately, I think it's far too committal to take it first pick and hope that BW is open.

[Hero of Goma Fada] seems sweet, and I haven't gotten to play with it yet, so I'd probably take it and hope a Wx Allies deck is open.

The runner up is probably [Stonefury], which is stretching pretty far since it's the third best common red removal spell.
